posts.post_title: FS:  T206 John McGraws - PSA 3 & PSA 4s
posts.post_content:
I currently have the following John McGraws available:

T206 McGraw, portrait with cap, Piedmont, PSA 4 (a PSA "4+" if you ask me) - $205
T206 McGraw, glove at hip, Piedmont, PSA 3 - $105
T206 McGraw, finger in air, Piedmont, PSA 4 - $185

All prices include delivery with signature confirmation.  Paypal fine with no additional surcharge.  Front and back scans of all are below.

Please email me at [url]aamoniz@yahoo.com[/url] if you would like any!

Regards,
Adam
